mapper.insert: INSERT INTO patent ( user_id, title, patent_no, year, status,word_File_Name) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{patentNo}, #{year}, #{status},#{wordFileName})
mapper.update: UPDATE patent SET user_id = #{userId}, title = #{title}, patent_no = #{patentNo}, year = #{year}, status = #{status}, word_File_Name = #{wordFileName} WHERE patent_id = #{patentId}
mapper.select: SELECT patent_id ,b.user_id ,title ,patent_no ,year ,status ,word_file_name ,approval_status ,reject_reason ,b.dept_id,u.user_name, u.email as user_email, d.dept_name FROM patent b LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d ON b.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE b.approval_status = #{status} ORDER BY b.[patent_id] DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE patent SET approval_status = #{status} WHERE patent_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patent WHERE approval_status = #{status}
